Reviews.Title: Works well enough.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Brodhagen
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised, and it's nice to have when you travel abroad often. I wish there had been better instructions on how to remove a link, it was really easy once I figured it out. Very large, I weigh 240 with about 19% BMI and It was too large for my wrist. After adjustment I was fine.

Reviews.Title: Price?
Reviews.Author: nythawk
Reviews.Content: I like gadgets as much as the next person but the price is a little steep. I hope it's a typo
